Boosters.d: Shows list of current server boosters. You can use `all` to list all-time server boosters after bot is added to server. `early` - current boosters sorted on based of time of boost. `top` - current boosters sorted on basis of number of boosts

Boosters.u: bb role < create | color | name | delete >
Boosters.d: Maintain your own custom role (only name and color).
Booster Level Roles on basis of number of boosts a user has. `bb lvlrole add <number of boosts> <role>` to set role as boost level. `bb lvlrole clear` removes all boost level roles.
Shows list of all claimed personal role by server boosters.

Users.d: Shows total boosts and boost level of server!
Shows user's server boost stats and information.
Enable or Disable upvote reminders! `Please vote, it helps a lot <3`
To get starter guide on bot. Step by step instructions to setup bot perfectly.

Shows list of current server boosters. You can use `all` to list all-time server boosters after bot is added to server. `early` - current boosters sorted on based of time of boost. `top` - current boosters sorted on basis of number of boosts
Shows all available commands or shows information on provided command.
Gives you useful links related to bot.

Admins.d: To get starter guide on bot. Step by step instructions to setup bot perfectly.

Admins.u: bb setup < prefix | manager | boost-role | add-role | remove-role | custom-role | log-channel >
Admins.d: For admins or bot manager to maintain bot settings for your server. `bb help setup` in any channel to get details on how to setup each property.

Admins.u: bb stats <crete | update | delete> <allboosts | currboosts | allboosters | currboosters>
Admins.d: Create or Update VCs for server booster stats.

Admins.u: bb greet <channel | message | image | embed | thumbnail | stats | test>
Admins.d: This command is used to setup/edit/remove Greet Configurations whenever someone boosts your server. `bb help greet` to see detailed info on how to configur settings.

Admins.u: bb emoji <lock | unlock | info> <emoji | normal | animated> <role>
Admins.d: Restrict emoji(s) to specified role i.e Only provided role members will be able to use this emoji. `bb help emoji` to see detailed instructions.
Add or Remove role from current or all time server boosters.
